verbs.description: another phil murphy official [V: was] investigated for behavior during campaign joe kelley was hired as a top staff member in the murphy administration after an investigation into his workplace behavior during the campaign julia fahl official al alvarez joe kelley phil murphy gov phil murphy gov phil murphy
